title: Amtrak
description:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it. • Show your eTicket while onboard, including multi-ride and monthly passes.
• Purchase one-way, roundtrip, multi-ride and monthly tickets
• Check train status
• Search for station information
• Save trip information to your phone calendar
• And so much more

All this, without the hassle of your laptop, making calls or printing your ticket.

For help or feedback on the Amtrak app, go to amtrak.com/contact-us.
short_desc: Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak on Android.
what_is_new:
• You can now purchase tickets in the app using the Amtrak National Student discount. It's available on the passenger information screen alongside other Amtrak discounts.
• The app now automatically identifies your credit card type during purchase.
